name: Dark Angel
overview: Earth, 2066. At the beginning of the century violent crime was ever increasing,and the world was turning into a death planet at an alarming pace. In an attempt to bring back law and order, in 2036 the Government build Artificial Human Emulators for use in the military and police forces. Crime was not wiped out completely, but it was reduced significantly. Until recently, the world had returned to relative peace. However, there is mounting evidence of these biomechanoid units have been malfunctioning and running on the rampage. They have become more of a threat than the criminals and terrorists they were built to combat. A secret organization was born to combat the biomechanoids, secret assassins that protect humankind. These brave agents are known as Dark Angels.
